title: Trump to host Italian President Mattarella at the White House on Thursday
text:
Trump to host Italian President Mattarella at the White House on Thursday

Politics 31 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 08:26PM ET)

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump will host Italian President Sergio Mattarella at the White House on Oct. 16, the White House said on Friday. The two leaders will "celebrate the strong and enduring historical ties between the United States and Italy, which underpin our bilateral relationship," the White House said. The Italian president plays a mainly ceremonial role and usually stays out of day-to-day politics.

Trump to host Italian President Mattarella at the White House on Thursday
description: Trump to host Italian President Mattarella at the White House on Thursday
